segments.text: May I see the manager of your company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am.What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Form your company's advertisement in the TWENTY-FIRST CENTURY , I learn that you are a foreign trade company of good service . I am interested in it.Here is my resume , ma'am .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good , you majored in International Trade ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will graduate from the People's University of China this July majoring in International Trade.Besides , at school , I am a top student.Moreover , both my spoken and written English are pretty good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , for this position , we prefer experienced employees , Those who have just graduated from university , they are supposed to start by working as an intern for at least half a year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I ' m qualified for the job if I can be given the chance.While at school , I once worked as part-time translator in a company and salesperson with a textile company for two years.And I don't mind being paid less from the start , I just want to enrich my experience and competence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good.That is the kind of man we are looking for.By the way , do you like traveling ? Our sales representatives need to travel a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . I like traveling very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you willing to work for extra hours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , I'll try my best.When can I start working ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great.Let ' s start next week.Thank you , ma'am .
segments.speaker: S1
